text_block_list.text: The summer training camp begins tomorrow.

Usually, overnight training presents a great opportunity 
for Uma Musume to develop their skills, however…

The training camp's gonna be by the sea…? 
That sounds so nice.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Fishing on the seashore, breathing in the scent of the ocean… 
Falling asleep to the sounds of the waves hitting the shore…
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Yup, this is gonna be so much fun ♪
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
I've been struggling to figure out how to get that slacker, 
Seiun Sky, to train while we're at the training camp…
Before I noticed, it was already morning…
Woah, the blue sky and the blue sea!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
It's a wonderful day to go fishing! 
Welp, guess I have no choice but to…
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
choice_data_list: At least look at the training regimen!
At least look at the training regimen!

text_block_list.text:
Whoops… Guess we have to 
train while we're here, huh?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Welp, guess there's no getting around it… 
Huh? Is this a special training regimen?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
What is this…? "Use the clues you are given 
to uncover the treasure hidden in the beach."
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
"If you are able to find all of the treasures 
within the specified time limit, you'll be 
allowed to eat as much food as you like from 
today until the end of this training camp?”
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Ohoho! A task filled with adventure, yet the rules 
allow for a test of speed and proper movement!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
A regimen combining fun and training! 
This is amazing.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Yup, I love this! I'm definitely going to 
get some training done while we're here!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: The training regimen was well-organized and Seiun Sky seemed to react positively towards it. However…

The midsummer heat was pretty taxing on my 
sleep-deprived body… It took everything in my 
power not to collapse…

Oi, Trainer-san… 
You seem a little out of it, are you okay?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
choice_data_list: I'm fine, continue with your training.
I'm fine, continue with your training.

text_block_list.text:
Seiun Sky ran off as soon as I gave her 
the next clue. As I watched her run off…
Eh, Trainer-san…!?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Hey… what's the matter!?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: I fainted on the beach…

When I came to, I found myself 
lying on a sofa in the camp site.

I remember training with Seiun Sky on 
the beach, but what happened after that…

Hey… It's almost time for dinner, but Sei-chan 
still hasn't returned yet, has she? Where did she go?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
Uhh, I think I heard her say 
"I'm going to the beach to go fishing ♪"
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B

text_block_list.text:
It seems like Seiun Sky was still out 
so I got up and went to go look for her.

As I stepped onto the beach, I saw the shadow 
of a lone Uma Musume running on the sand.
Phew… For me, this is pretty good.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
But just in case, 
I should do a couple more laps…
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Wait, uwah…! 
Trainer-san!?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Ah, umm… Well I'm glad you're awake. I don't 
know what I would've done if you slept through 
the whole training session.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Well, I guess if you were resting that means I 
could rest too, so it would've been lucky for me I guess.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
I've been enjoying 
myself while you were asleep.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Yet, as she said this I noticed 
that her jersey was caked in sand.

But I guess even if I say that, 
it's pretty obvious, huh?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
While I do prefer slacking off, 
it really depends on the situation.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
After all, you worked so hard on my behalf to 
the point where you collapsed, so I figured you 
deserved a reward of some sort.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Oh…?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Oh, what's this…? 
Could it be… has it risen once again?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Pirorirorirorin ♪
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Yup, it sure has! Sei-chan's bond rank 
with her trainer has increased once again!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
You must be thinking "wow, to train so 
diligently while alone, she's so mature and 
working so hard," aren't you?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Or wait, did you purposefully collapse so that 
you'd get me to train on my own, voluntarily…!?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
choice_data_list: And if that were the case?
And if that were the case?

text_block_list.text:
Uwah, you're so scary! Despite your calm composure, 
I can't believe I have to be careful around you!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Well maybe that's what connects us… 
That we can't be too careful around one another.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, so you're admitting 
you've gotta be careful around me?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Well I'll be waiting for your 
next cunning trick then, Trainer-san.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Like one that'll cause a stir in the 
Twinkle Series, or something… Just kidding.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
She said she was joking, but there 
was a glint of seriousness in her eyes.
